name: Cadaver (itch)
description:
Get as many points as possible by building many graves

Expired graves are signalled by a spirit, click on the grave to remove it. The spirit leaves with the gravestone, allowing you to build more graves, but weakening your establishment's defences against the spirit world. Consider preserving the ancestors and keeping families together during hard times.

Darkened graves are broken in spirit, and can be rejuvenated by their family.

Graves can be removed prematurely for a fee with the Remove option. The price on your wallet is trivial when compared to the price on your conscience. 

Restart the game with R
